issue.title: twitter.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://twitter.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com) ### Comment > Ads now appearing in X (Twitter). Iâ€™ve previously reported (twice) that ads are appearing in Facebook.com and both times the issue has been closed, but not yet fixed, Username: `@Shaz99-99` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gsqnlyz3y48wkswcccgccwk0owkc4own4poigpn540.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://twitter.com/eggika_/status/1726674274927444253](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Feggika_%2Fstatus%2F1726674274927444253) ### Comment > New advertisements have begun to appear on Twitter, and they are irritating. Determine how you can respond to them. Similar to Adguard, Ghostery and Ublock Origin failed to block these advertisements; this must be an instance of a new script injection. Kindly adjust your filters. > > Thank you ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/9m1vaj5l63okk8o4co844g8s08wwsowqt2wbmzlf68.png?nc=1)
